name: Plastics Recyclers Europe
goal: We focus on the promotion of plastics recycling and the creation of conditions which enable profitable and sustainable business.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Information Society, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Environment, waste, chemical, trade and plastics legislations affecting the plastics recycling industry.
